thread.title: Jane Fonda looks incredible in a Versace gown at CDGAs | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Jane Fonda looks incredible in a Versace gown at CDGAs | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Sotoodeh For Dailymail.Com
title: Jane Fonda looks incredible in a Versace gown at CDGAs | Daily Mail Online
text: 25 shares Jane's number had a long skirt that cascaded to the ground. The Barefoot In the Park star rocked diamond earrings as well as a matching ring while toting a structured clutch. The 79-year-old wowed in a silky black Versace dress with an asymmetrical neckline and fitted waist Flawless: The actress chose a figure flattering frock with a folded detail along the waistline Jane wore her light brunette tresses in waves. The Golden Globe award winning actress sported pink lipstick with shimmery eye makeup and rosy blush. She is currently in the midst of filming Our Souls At Night. Fancy: Jane wore her light brunette tresses in waves Jane, who plays Addie Moore, stars alongside Robert Redford. This will be the fifth film Jane and Robert have co-starred in. They were cast mates in Tall Story in 1960, The Chase in 1966, Barefoot In The Park in 1967 and The Electric Horseman in 1979. Amazing: The Golden Globe award winning actress wore pink lipstick with shimmery eye makeup and rosy blush; seen with Lacoste S.A. Director Beryl Lacoste Hamilton Strike a pose: The Barefoot In the Park star rocked diamond earrings as well as a matching ring while toting a structured clutch; seen with costume designer Allyson B. Fanger Wow: Part of the neckline dipped down on one shoulder, flashing her decolletage; seen with Lily Tomlin and Allyson Share or comment on this article 25
